DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare acute technical outcome Talent AAA Stent Graft system versus Cook Zenith Endograft two high volume institution , Albany Medical Center St. Peter 's Hospital Albany , NY . The investigator compare two device part evolution endovascular repair ( EVAR ) AAAs . The Zenith AAA Endovascular Graft receive FDA approval May 23 , 2003 , Talent Abdominal Stent Graft System April 15 , 2008 .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Technical Outcomes Talent Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm ( AAA ) Stent-Graft Versus Cook Zenith Stent-Graft
DOC.criteria: subject abdominal aortic aneurysm , without iliac involvement iliac/femoral access vessel morphology compatible vascular access technique , device , and/or accessory less 18 year age pregnant lactating contraindication use contrast medium anticoagulation drug patient condition threaten infect graft patient sensitivity allergy device material
DOC.keyword: patient match base AAA neck length neck iliac angulation
